name: free-fe-starter-kit
description: Build your enterprise information system freely
author: zhiquan

scripts.start:android: cross-env env=capacitor quasar dev -m capacitor -T android
scripts.start:ios: cross-env env=capacitor quasar dev -m capacitor -T ios
scripts.build:android: cross-env env=capacitor quasar build -m capacitor -T android
scripts.build:android:sign: cross-env env=capacitor quasar build -m capacitor -T android && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore android.keystore ./dist/capacitor/android/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk free && ~/Library/Android/sdk/build-tools/28.0.0/zipalign -f -v 4 ./dist/capacitor/android/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk wcjf.apk
scripts.build:ios: cross-env env=capacitor quasar build -m capacitor -T ios
scripts.build:docker: yarn build:test && docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t freeeis-xxx/fe:v1 -f ./Dockerfile --rm=true --squash ./dist/spa
scripts.build:docker:prod: yarn build:prod && docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t freeeis-xxx/fe_prod:v1 -f ./Dockerfile --rm=true --squash ./dist/spa
scripts.docker:push: docker tag freeeis-xxx/fe:v1 repo.xixineis.com/freeeis-xxx/fe:v1 && docker push repo.xixineis.com/freeeis-xxx/fe:v1
scripts.docker:push:prod: docker tag freeeis-xxx/fe_prod:v1 repo.xixineis.com/freeeis-xxx/freeeis-xxx/fe_prod:v1 && docker push repo.xixineis.com/freeeis-xxx/fe_prod:v1
